Sentencas: BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 (BCAS) glass-ceramics can be used as sealant for large size planar anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: BCAS glass ceramics after heat treatment for different times were characterized by means of thermal dilatometer, X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The results show that the coefficients of thermal expansion (CTE) of BCAS glass-ceramics are 11.4 x 10(-6) K-1, 11.3 x 10(-6) K-1 and 11.2 x 10(-6)
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: K-1 after heated at 750 degrees C for Oh, 50 h, and 100 h, respectively.
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The CTE of BCAS matches that of YSZ, Ni-YSZ and the interconnection of SOFC.
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Needle-like barium silicate, barium calcium silicate and hexacelsian are crystallized in the BCAS glass after heat-treatment for above 50 h at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The glass ceramics green tape prepared by aqueous tape casting can be directly applied in sealing the cell of SOFCs with 10 cm x 10 cm.
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The open circuit voltage (OCV) of the cell keeps 1.19 V after running for 280 h at 750 degrees C and thermal cycling 10 times from 750 degrees C to room temperature.
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The maximum power density is 0.42 W/cm(2) using pure H-2 as fuel and air as oxidation gas.
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC

Sentencas: SEM images show no cracks or pores exist in the interface of BCAS glass ceramics and the cell.
Titulo: Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC
Application of BaO-CaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic seals in large size planar IT-SOFC
